alert.note: Alert for Apache; Navajo (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 14 at 11:54AM MST until May 14 at 12:45PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: The National Weather Service in Flagstaff has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Apache County in northeastern Arizona... Navajo County in north central Arizona... * Until 1245 PM MST. * At 1154 AM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pinetop-lakeside, or 11 miles southeast of Show Low, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Show Low, Pinetop-lakeside, Lake Of The Woods--Pinetop-lakeside, Wagon Wheel, Pinetop Country Club, Scott Reservoir Campground, Fool Hollow Lake Campground, White Mountain Lake, Lakeside Campground, Los Burros Campground, Mcnary and Brown Creek Campground. This includes the following highways... State Route 260 between mile markers 335 and 360. State Route 77 between mile markers 343 and 348. Highway 60 between mile markers 337 and 356. State Route 61 between mile markers 353 and 355. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
